title: Designing Sustained and Humanized Education Strategies through e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Digital Literacy and Practical Experience in Elementary Education
context.additional_context: Strengthening digital competencies and human-centered instructional design capabilities for elementary education practitioners in smartphone-centric, resource-limited technological environments

learning_goals: Analyze core elements of e-learning technical infrastructure to design strategies for educational sustainability
Build humanized learning environments by applying digital educational materials and pedagogies that promote learner engagement
Derive e-learning improvement plans reflecting learner needs using focus group discussion techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
